document_data.name: ''On the Worship of Umberlee''
document_data.mainbody: '''''On the Worship of Umberlee''''' was a book that collected information on the practices of the [[Church of Umberlee]]. It was popular among pirates of the [[Sea of Swords]] and [[Nelanther Islands]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Contents: The first part of the book covered the malicious [[Umberlee|Stormgoddess of the Seas]] herself, her inconsistent and petty personality, and her love of flattery and power. The second part described the worshiping traditions, tithes, and donations to the Church of Umberlee and her shrines. The third part talked about the Church in general, it being disorganized and prone to violence, and the Umberlant priests often selling their services to ships. And lastly the fourth part described the [[cleric]]s' and worshipers' holy festivals and customs.
document_data.History: This book about the worshipers of the Bitch Queen was often found in homes and establishments frequented by pirates of the Sea of Swords. It was often sold by vendors of [[Spindrift Town]] and [[Neverwinter]]'s harbor ''circa'' 1372 DR.
